messages.message:
Has everyone read these two? Worth a read! Hopefully, we'll have a more detailed post-mortem from FB soon.

https://blog.cloudflare.com/october-2021-facebook-outage/

https://engineering.fb.com/2021/10/04/networking-traffic/outage/
Another great example of how stats helped cloudflare rootcause the issue and impact :slightly_smiling_face:
